duties_responsibilities.duty: Assisting customers by answering questions about available products and services.
Guiding customers through the sales process, both in person and digitally.
Setting personal income goals consistent with dealership standards and devising a strategy to meet those goals.
Keeping abreast of new products, features, and accessories.

education_certification.credential: Previous successful Automotive Sales Experience is a plus, but Sales experience in any industry will be considered.
Professional appearance and good communication skills.
Strong record of positive customer service results with a customer-focused attitude.
Integrity, Positive Attitude, and Strong Work Ethic Required.
Proven track record of Customer Service.
Valid Driver's License with Clean Driving Record.
